content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to read the "productive_things_to_do.txt" file and append "Appended text." to "file_logger.txt". I then replaced "Appended text." with "Replaced text." in "file_logger.txt" and attempted to delete it again, receiving the same error message. I requested a list of files in the current directory and received a response with a list of file names.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "productive_things_to_do.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "append_to_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "text": "Appended text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "replace_in_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt", "old_text": "Appended text.", "new_text": "Replaced text.", "occurrence_index": 0}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "delete_file", "args": {"filename": "file_logger.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command delete_file returned: Error: File has already been deleted.', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['atlas.yaml', 'atlas.settings.yaml', 'file_logger.txt', 'atlas.json', 'ai_code.py', 'legal_research_resources.txt', 'average.py', 'test_average.py', 'featured_article.txt', '<filename>', 'eisenhower_box_notes.txt', 'productive_things_to_do.txt', 'clockify_info.txt', 'clockify_features.txt', 'pumble_features.txt', 'pumble_pricing.txt', 'automate_task.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area_calculation.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/generate_password.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/password_generator.py']", type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_file", "args": {"filename": "average.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_file returned: The average of the numbers is: 3.0\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "write_to_file", "args": {"filename": "new_file.txt", "text": "This is some new text."}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.', type='action_result')]
"""
